description: This file defines a React functional component 'Logo' that renders animated visual elements for a video or graphic project using the Remotion library. It imports other components ('Arc' and 'Atom') and uses hooks for video configuration and current frame to animate SVG-like elements with rotation and scaling effects. It also defines a schema 'myCompSchema2' for validating color input properties.

methods.name: Logo
methods.description: React functional component that renders animated logo elements with configurable colors, utilizing interpolation and spring animations based on the current video frame.
